Context:
The Automation Process Developer Program at George Brown College was developed in response to the trend of process automation in enterprise software development. The program aims to help students gain knowledge, skills, and tools to identify processes suitable for automation, design and develop automation solutions, and implement and manage these solutions within an organization. The program is delivered by industry experts and offers access to UiPath materials, software, and certifications. Upon completion of the program, a certificate of completion can be requested using the department contact information.

The college is located on the traditional territory of the Mississaugas of the Credit First Nation and other Indigenous peoples. The information contained in this website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
